mapper.select: SELECT U.NICKNAME AS userNickname, U.PROFILE_IMAGE_URL AS userProfileImg, U.TOTAL_POINTS AS score FROM USERS U WHERE U.TOTAL_POINTS > 0 ORDER BY score DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
SELECT TAG_ID, TAG_NAME FROM TAGS ORDER BY TAG_NAME

SELECT C.CHALLENGE_ID, C.TITLE, C.DESCRIPTION, C.IMAGE_URL, T.TAG_ID, T.TAG_NAME, CASE WHEN UC.STATUS = 'ONGOING' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_PARTICIPATING FROM CHALLENGES C LEFT JOIN CHALLENGE_TAGS CT ON C.CHALLENGE_ID = CT.CHALLENGE_ID LEFT JOIN TAGS T ON CT.TAG_ID = T.TAG_ID LEFT JOIN USER_CHALLENGES UC ON C.CHALLENGE_ID = UC.CHALLENGE_ID AND UC.USER_ID = #{userId}
(C.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR C.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
AND C.CHALLENGE_ID IN ( SELECT CT2.CHALLENGE_ID FROM CHALLENGE_TAGS CT2 JOIN TAGS T2 ON CT2.TAG_ID = T2.TAG_ID WHERE T2.TAG_NAME = #{tag} )
ORDER BY C.CHALLENGE_ID DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT C.CHALLENGE_ID) FROM CHALLENGES C
(C.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR C.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
AND C.CHALLENGE_ID IN ( SELECT CT2.CHALLENGE_ID FROM CHALLENGE_TAGS CT2 JOIN TAGS T2 ON CT2.TAG_ID = T2.TAG_ID WHERE T2.TAG_NAME = #{tag} )

SELECT C.CHALLENGE_ID, C.TITLE, C.DESCRIPTION, C.IMAGE_URL, T.TAG_ID, T.TAG_NAME, CASE WHEN UC.STATUS = 'ONGOING' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_PARTICIPATING FROM CHALLENGES C LEFT JOIN CHALLENGE_TAGS CT ON C.CHALLENGE_ID = CT.CHALLENGE_ID LEFT JOIN TAGS T ON CT.TAG_ID = T.TAG_ID LEFT JOIN USER_CHALLENGES UC ON C.CHALLENGE_ID = UC.CHALLENGE_ID AND UC.USER_ID = #{userId} WHERE C.TARGET_GOAL = #{goal} FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY

SELECT C.CHALLENGE_ID, C.TITLE, C.DESCRIPTION, C.IMAGE_URL, T.TAG_ID, T.TAG_NAME, CASE WHEN UC.STATUS = 'ONGOING' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_PARTICIPATING FROM CHALLENGES C LEFT JOIN CHALLENGE_TAGS CT ON C.CHALLENGE_ID = CT.CHALLENGE_ID LEFT JOIN TAGS T ON CT.TAG_ID = T.TAG_ID LEFT JOIN USER_CHALLENGES UC ON C.CHALLENGE_ID = UC.CHALLENGE_ID AND UC.USER_ID = #{userId} WHERE C.TARGET_PERSONA = #{persona} FETCH FIRST 2 ROWS ONLY

SELECT C.CHALLENGE_ID, C.TITLE, C.DESCRIPTION, C.IMAGE_URL, UC.PROGRESS_PERCENT FROM CHALLENGES C JOIN USER_CHALLENGES UC ON C.CHALLENGE_ID = UC.CHALLENGE_ID WHERE UC.USER_ID = #{userId} AND UC.STATUS = #{status} ORDER BY UC.START_DATE DESC
